channel.title: Trippy Stuff
channel.description: A collection of randomly trippy and psychadelic stories by G3n3r0

item.title: Bullying
item.description:
Alfonze came up to me. He took out a shiv that he had whittled. He stabbed at me, rupturing my kidney. I quickly responded, throwing an autodidactic grenade into his mouth. There was an Explosion, followed by Darkness.
When I awoke, I was in a dimly lit room. A sticky Substance covered the ground. I pusillanimously pulled myself to my feet. I began sinking into the slick, cucumbery Substance. I leveled my body out again, and felt myself gliding upwards like ocotpodes through pink Jello. I regained buoyancy, and took in a deep braeth of the peppermint Wind. I glided through the Substance like a butterfly. Suddenly, gamboge Lights flickered beneath me. A shimmering aquadillo lept from beneath the semisolid liquid. There was no ripple, it just seemed to pass beyond the surface. It made a sound like the air passing through an x-ray rainbow in Xanadu. The aquadillo then went back through the substance as it had come, but a sound like breaking glass danced upon my ears. More aquadillos began leaping through the air. They joined me in swimming, and soon I didn't know who was following who. I saw a glimmering, ultraviolet light up ahead, and saw the aquadillos swim away. I stood up, and felt solid ground beneath my feet. In the light, I could see ancient statues of Kubla Khan and his likenesses faintly outlined. Slowly, I walked into the light.
I fell out of one of the many pinhole cameras dotting the school like tiny aphids on a quivering blade of grass in a flickering, bat-filled field. I landed face-first on one of the deflated bean-bag chairs with a loud thump. The disgruntled librarian gave me an angry look, and then proceeded to shush me. Alfonze came up to me.
